type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.Upload
type.description: Uploads the artifacts of a Configuration to a set of repositories.

method.name: getRepositories
method.description: Returns the repositories to upload to.

method.name: repositories
method.description: Configures the set of repositories to upload to.

method.name: getDescriptorDestination
method.description: Returns the path to generate the dependency descriptor to.

method.name: isUploadDescriptor
method.description: Specifies whether the dependency descriptor should be uploaded.

method.name: getArtifacts
method.description:
Returns the artifacts which will be uploaded.

returns:the artifacts.

property.name: repositories
property.description: Returns the repositories to upload to.

property.name: artifacts
property.description:
Returns the artifacts which will be uploaded.

returns:the artifacts.

property.name: descriptorDestination
property.description: Returns the path to generate the dependency descriptor to.

property.name: uploadDescriptor
property.description: Specifies whether the dependency descriptor should be uploaded.
